parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value for this parameter on your client. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see How to ensure idempotence.

parameters.name: DnsGroup
parameters.description:
The built-in authoritative DNS group.

- Standard zone group: NORMAL\_ZONE

- Acceleration zone group: FAST\_ZONE

<props="china">

> Starting from April 30, 2025 (UTC+8), when new users of Alibaba Cloud DNS PrivateZone create a zone, the zone is set to an acceleration zone by default.

</props>

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The global ID of the zone.
